title: 114_hr2391
content: The Act titled "Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act of 2015" applies the Medicaid additional rebate requirement to generic drugs. The Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act of 2015 amends Section 1927(c)(3) of the Social Security Act to include an additional rebate requirement for generic drugs. The Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act of 2015 introduces a new rebate requirement for generic drugs, increasing rebates for single source or innovator multiple source drugs in a specific manner. Special rules apply for the application of this provision. The Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act of 2015 introduces new rebate requirements for generic drugs, adjusting references to 2014 and changing the calculation of rebates based on drug prices. The Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act of 2015 introduces new rebate requirements for generic drugs, adjusting references to 2014 and changing the calculation of rebates based on drug prices. The 12-calendar quarter period ending on September 30, 2014 is subject to certain adjustments in references and dates. The Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act of 2015 introduces new rebate requirements for generic drugs, adjusting references to 2014 and changing the calculation of rebates based on drug prices. References to specific drug types are modified, including noninnovator multiple source drugs. The Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act of 2015 introduces new rebate requirements for generic drugs, adjusting references to 2014 and changing the calculation of rebates based on drug prices. References to specific drug types are modified, including noninnovator multiple source drugs. When applying paragraph (2)(A)(ii)(II) for covered outpatient drugs sold after a certain date, specific substitutions are made for time periods. The Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act of 2015 amends rebate requirements for generic drugs, changing references to 2014 and adjusting rebate calculations based on drug prices. The effective date for these amendments is after December 31, 2014.
